page.title: 10 Junior School Events
page.content: In the schools in our area there are competitions in football,cricket,cross country,athletics,mini-rugby,netball, swimming and chess.Among the other events were a music makers festival,an evening of dance at Belgrave school and this term Amington Heath have invited other schools to 'invade' them using song and drama showing different periods of history. Many schools have held summer fairs on Saturdays or Sundays. In our school,Wilnecote Junior there are thirteen different clubs. We have teams for football,cricket, swimming, athletics and mini-rugby. We have an orchestra,choir and recorder group. Our other clubs are for those interested in dance,gymnastics,birds,art and country dancing.
